page.title: 12F of D Berry Hill School day
page.content: {School}starts at{9.am}when we have both{registers dinner/absence.At {9.15am}we go up for{assembly}to dis- cuss certain things,sing and have a story.At{9.45am}we go back to{class {where we}start our lessons.These are {lessons}for the{morning-wordwork,comp- {rehension.It is then tuck time-we have {crisps,chocolate,sweets or drink.Break {lasts from 10.30}to{10.45.The yard is} {about half an acre in size and the {field is about two acres.Maths}is done until{dinner time.We have a cooked {meal}or{sandwiches}for{lunch.On a {Monday}we go{swimming}for{half an {hour,have afternoon break and then have{P.E.Home time is 3.30.Depending on the day there are{football}and {netball}practises.Occasionally we have people in who wil give us a{concert, talk about a{charity}and show us a {film.
